title: severance ld fast walkthrough
description:
Hello world.

Here you have a walkthrough of the game "severance blade of darkness", also know as "blade edge of darkness" in spain. The main idea i keep in mind when i recorded it is 2 offer a fast 1, without lose time in tactic defensive combat, or searching 4 life potions, or taking unusefull weapons. Sort of "time attack" 1. This is because i play full of cheats: long range weapons, infinite life, high level, etc...

Also, i recorded it in "low definition" (320x240 with low bitrate), so you can store it in less hard drive space than the game itself. Sorry 4 the low quality of the movies, and i hope you aprecciate it provided you want 2 watch/download the complete collection. The codec setup i used (you have the technical stuff downstair) drops a size of 2 mb/min; i think is an acceptable balance quality/size.

If you are looking 4 hd severance movies without use cheats, we cannot help you here. You have plenty of them in youtube.

Finally, i used my own music collection in the movies. Most is techno stuff (but not only). If you dont like it, please, remember that you can mute the sound, quite 2 the reverse i'm gonna do with the comments. I'm sure you are gonna understand what i mean...

Fell free 2 rate and comment (or not), but not 2 subscribe, since i dont have in mind 2 release more videos soon.

4 those people that cannot enjoy the complete collection due the copyright trouble, i'm gonna try to offer it in our favourite p2p place ;) Patience since i don't have internet conection anytime.
	
Music theme:
01 tabriz: now-a-days techno
02 kelbegen: classic based trance 
03 tell-halaf: prodigy
04 ephyra: demoscene
05 karum: epic
06 shalatuwar: old school techno
07 orlok: 2cellos
08 nemrut: lain
09 nejeb: anime opening
10 al-farum: french pop
11 xathra: spanish rock
12 ianna: melancholia
13 dal-gurak: goa 
14 abyss: goa

Codec specifications
Container: mp4
Video codec: h264
Video resolution: 320x240
Video fps: 25
Video bitrate: 240 kbps
Audio codec: aac (sbr+ps)
Audio channels: estereo
Audio bitrate: 16 kbps
Audio hz: 44100

Software i have used (provided you wanna do the same):
Music player: vlc
Video capture: fraps
Video encoder: real anime 6

My computer:
Processor: intel atom n270 1.60ghz
Ram: 1gb
Graphic card: mobile intel 945 224mb

Thx 4 watching.
